text: Sermey Khensur Lobsang Tharchin Rinpoche (1921–2004) was a scholar of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism. ==References== * SERMEY KHENSUR LOBSANG THARCHIN RINPOCHE: 1921-2004 Category:Lamas Category:1921 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Rinpoches Category:Gelug Lamas
title: Sermey Khensur Lobsang Tharchin
